text: Hagi keho, ko'ma tamasami'na henkama efore'ma hugahie hu'nama tamasami'noa zantamina, ko efore huno evie, ana hige'na kasefa zantamima henkama efore'ma hania zamofo menina erinte ama hu'na neramasamue. Ana zantamima efore osu'nesnige'na ko tamasami'nugeta antahitesnageno, henka anazana efore haniegu neramasamue.
